LifemapR 1.0.2
  • Reference
  • Articles
    run-LifemapR

    Function reference

    All functions

    LM_eukaryotes
    Transformation in a LifemapR format of NCBI informations for 1000 eukaryotes
    add_lm_branches()
    Compute the aes for a subtree.
    add_lm_markers()
    Compute the aes for a set of points.
    add_lm_piecharts()
    Compute the aes for discret values.
    build_Lifemap()
    A function to construct a LifemapR object, usable by the other functions of the package.
    create_matrix()
    Create a dataframe for the ancestry.
    create_value_range()
    Compute a new scale for a value
    display_map()
    Create a Lifemap base.
    display_option()
    Compute the different display options.
    draw_Lifemap()
    Represent datas on a Lifemap basemap.
    eukaryotes_1000
    NCBI informations for 1000 eukaryotes
    eukaryotes_80
    NCBI informations for 80 eukaryotes
    gen_res
    Genomic results
    get_direct_ancestor()
    Add the direct ancestor for each taxa of the dataframe.
    is.lifemap_obj()
    Reports whether x is a lifemap_obj object.
    is.lm_branches()
    Reports whether x is a lm_branches object.
    is.lm_markers()
    Reports whether x is a lm_markers object.
    is.lm_piecharts()
    Reports whether x is a lm_branches object.
    kraken_res
    Kraken results
    lifemap()
    Initialise a new Lifemap visualisation.
    lm_branches()
    Add a "branches" layer to a lifemap_obj object.
    lm_markers()
    add a "markers" layer to a lifemap_obj object.
    lm_piecharts()
    Add a "piecharts" layer to a lifemap_obj object.
    make_newick()
    Create a newick for the given dataset.
    pass_infos()
    Infer numerical values to nodes.
    pass_infos_discret()
    Pass discret informations to nodes
    `+`(<lifemap_obj>)
    Add a graphical element to a tree visualisation.
    print(<lifemap_obj>)
    Method to print lifemap_obj objects.
    request_database()
    Request one of the core of the solr database corresponding to the basemap choosen with TaxIDs wanted.
    url_verification()
    Check if the URL is working
